review: Our previous experience has been with an LG Blu-Ray player that had online connectivity. We thought that was great until someone shared their positive experiences using Apple TV.  We immediately ordered ourselves one and 2 days later (love Amazon Prime!), we were in business.  It is so much easier to navigate than our Blu-Ray player and quickly became our device of choice. We particularly like Air Play and use our iPhones and iPad with it often. It's great for playing YouTube videos and watching Netflix/Amazon Prime movies. Another bonus is the ability to project your iPhone/iPad photos onto the TV, particularly nice if you have company over and don't want to pass around phones. Loved it so much I ordered one for my parents too. If you have an iPhone or iPad, it's definitely worth getting one!
